title: bhArata shakti
sahitya:
bhArata shakti sattiya jyOti pArinai mATrum parishavEdi


anupallavi

  pUraNa shAntam pongiDum azhagE puNNiya jIva kAruNya vAzhvE


caraNam    tEn pozhi shOlat-tInkani amudam jaya jayavennum tiraikaDal murasam
UnvaLar uyiril vAshuvai pozhiyum unnaruLAlE ulagiruL ozhiyum
sundara mangaLa shAntam engum tulangiDum sutantara vIram
